articles.author: Pat McManamonESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Randall didn't expect jersey tweet to go viral
articles.description: Damarious Randall didn't think his tweet about buying jerseys for each retweet if the Cavs won the title would surpass 100. It's approaching 800,000.

articles.title: Bond for ex-wife of slain NBAer Wright at $20M
articles.description: A $20 million bond has been issued for Sherra Wright, who has been charged in the shooting death of her ex-husband, former NBA player Lorenzen Wright.

articles.author: Mike WellsESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Good Luck? Manning believes QB needs 'reps'
articles.description: Former Indianapolis Colts quarterback Peyton Manning believes the key to Andrew Luck returning to form is plenty of practice reps.

articles.author: Sarah BarshopESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Doctor who? Texans' Watt honored with degree
articles.description: After J.J. Watt received an honorary doctorate from the Baylor College of Medicine, the Texans star jokingly prescribed coach Bill O'Brien "chill pills" and teammate Christian Covington a cure for "weirdness."

articles.author: Dan RafaelESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: Doc: Lomachenko has 'nice labrum repair'
articles.description: Boxing's current pound-for-pound king Vasiliy Lomachenko had successful surgery to repair a torn labrum in his right shoulder on Wednesday.

articles.author: Alex ScarboroughESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Malzahn: Headset rule will hurt quality of game
articles.description: Auburn coach Gus Malzahn called a rule the NCAA has instituted that will limit the number of people on headsets during games "a joke."

articles.author: Jonathan GivonyESPN
articles.title: NBA mock draft: Every likely pick in both rounds
articles.description: We break down new landing spots for some of the top prospects as well as the latest risers in the first round.
